channel.title: How to make higher combat levels and skill levels[317]
channel.description: yes well i would like some help on making the skill levels higher instead of the normal level 99 and the normal level 126 please help this is for a 317

item.title: How to make higher combat levels and skill levels[317]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

simple,
just find this in client.java:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then you should see something as this:

int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <=99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } }
just change this:

		return 99;

and the 99 in this:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++)

to your desired skill lvl wanted, NOTE: this wil also change the max combat level.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make higher combat levels and skill levels[317]
